mapper.select: select id from briup_department where name like #{word}
select id from briup_course where name like #{word}
select id from briup_clazz where name like #{word}
select id from briup_teacher where name like #{word}
select name from briup_department where id=#{department_id}
select name from briup_course where id=#{course_id}
select name from briup_teacher where id=#{user_id}
select name from briup_questionnaire where id=#{questionnaire_id}

select a.* from briup_survey a,briup_course b,briup_teacher c,briup_questionnaire d,briup_department e,briup_clazz f where b.name like #{word} or c.name like #{word} or d.name like #{word} or e.name like #{word} or f.name like #{word} and a.department_id=e.id and a.course_id=b.id and a.clazz_id=f.id and a.user_id=c.id and a.questionnaire_id=d.id
